name: Jonathan (Helnyr, Danny-vD, Lars Kristian Blom / Fuzei)
name_original: Jonathan (Helnyr, Danny-vD, Lars Kristian Blom / Fuzei)
description:
JONATHAN

Escape the hospital and find a cure for yourself before it's too late. Avoid the bugs or they will kill you before the corruption does.

Game made for the XP x LiNK Game Jam at Saxion University of Applied Sciences!

Theme: Bugs

Programming:

  • Danny van Duist
  • Darian Badia Noguero

Art

  • Memsi Karadalieva
  • Daphne Barrink
  • Hendrik Ogg
  • Shelby Casas

Audio

  • Lars Kristian Blom
